content.question: Which of the following has contributed most to the deindustrialization of regions like the English Midlands and the North American Manufacturing Belt?

choices.label: The increased percentage of women in the labor force
The formation of free trade associations

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 7.7: Changes as a Result of the World Economy

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
